snippet: Derick Brassard, acquired from Columbus near the trading deadline, had two assists in a Game 4 win over Washington after collecting three assists in Game 3.
abstract: New York Rangers center Derick Brassard has injected new life into team's power play, collecting two assists in Game 4 of their Eastern Conference quarterfinal series against Washington Capitals after recording three assists in Game 3.
lead_paragraph: Derick Brassard, acquired from Columbus near the trading deadline, had two assists in a Game 4 win over Washington after collecting three assists in Game 3.

headline.seo: Derick Brassard Injects Life Into Rangers’ Power Play
headline.main: New Ranger Injects New Life Into Team’s Power Play
headline.print_headline: New Ranger Injects New Life Into Team’s Power Play
